variable.name: AGE_DEATH
variable.description: Age at death
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2261932 (Public ID)

variable.name: AGE_FRST_EMR_DEM_ICD9_CD
variable.description: Age at 1st qualifying ICD9 dementia code
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3012737 (Public ID)

variable.name: Age_Met_EMR_Dementia_Criteria
variable.description: Age when qualified for EMR dementia definition (1st qualifying drug or 5th qualifying DX)
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3012773 (Public ID)

variable.name: DECADE_BIRTH
variable.description: Decade of Birth
variable.comment: GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3018429 (Public ID)

variable.name: DEMENTIA_EMR_DEFINITION
variable.description: Electronic Medical Record Definition of Dementia requiring a minimum of 5 visits with dementia DX code or a dementia drug prescription
variable.comment: GH-ACT External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3018427 (Public ID)

variable.name: Diabetes_Mellitus_Age_NW_defn
variable.description: Age at first mention of diabetes in record (For GH, age of first icd9 code [250.xx 362.0x 357.2x] or self-reported year of onset)
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH, MC, VU

variable.name: ethnicity
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant
variable.comment: NIH Ethnic categories; GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resources: caDSR; enter source ID: 2002440 (Public ID) and caBig; source ID: C29933

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of Participant
variable.comment: NIH Racial categories; GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C17049
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

variable.name: sex
variable.description: Sex of Participant
variable.comment: GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C44177

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Research Case Identifier
variable.comment: Deidentified ID (eMERGE ID); GH, MC, VU, Mayo External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2181644 (Public ID)

variable.name: AGE_LAST_KNOWN_DEMENTIA_FREE
variable.description: Age last known dementia free (DSMiv)
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH-ACT External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3012733 (Public ID)

variable.name: age_NINdx_alzheimers_onset
variable.description: Age at Alzheimer's Disease onset as defined by the NINCDS-ADRDA definition
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH cases External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3012735 (Public ID)

variable.name: age_DSMiv_dementia_onset
variable.description: Age at dementia onset as defined by the DSM IV definition
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH cases External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3018486 (Public ID)

variable.name: Age_Study_Enrollment
variable.description: Age at enrollment in the ACT or ADPR study
variable.comment: Age 90+ years listed as age 90; GH External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2724805 (Public ID)

variable.name: Cognitive_Dec_Quartile
variable.description: Quartiles of rate of cognitive decline
variable.comment: GH-ACT cases External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3014441 (Public ID)
variable.value: Single observation so no rate of change available

variable.name: dementia_dsmiiidx
variable.description: DSM III definition of dementia
variable.comment: GH-ADPR

variable.name: dementia_dsmivdx
variable.description: DSM IV definition of dementia
variable.comment: GH-ACT cases
variable.value: Dementia - Due to other General Medical Condition(s)

variable.name: dementia_nindx
variable.description: NINCDS-ADRDA definition of dementia of the Alzheimer's type
variable.comment: GH cases External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3018422 (Public ID)

variable.name: Education_Level_Years
variable.description: Years of education completed
variable.comment: GH-ACT External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C17953

variable.name: education_level_adpr
variable.description: Years of education completed (Level of education)
variable.comment: GH-ADPR
variable.value: More than high school (e.g. college or prof.)

variable.name: Number_of_CASI_Occasions
variable.description: Number of occasions CASI (Cognitive Abilities Screening Instrument) score was measured
variable.comment: GH-ACT cases

variable.name: Smoking_Status
variable.description: Self-reported smoking
variable.comment: GH, MC External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C19796

variable.name: Dementia_EMR_Validated
variable.description: How dementia EMR was validated at Marshfield
variable.comment: MC

variable.name: Education_Level_Categories
variable.description: Education Completed Categories
variable.comment: MC, Mayo
variable.value: Training past high school (such as vocational or technical training)
